info.name: School Portal API
info.description:
Ethiopian Secondary School Grade Management System API

Base URL: http://localhost:5000/api/v1

## Authentication
Most endpoints require JWT token. After login, copy the `access_token` and set it in the collection variables or use it in the Authorization header.

## Test Users
- Admin: admin@schoolportal.edu.et / password123

item.name: 1. Authentication
item.description: Login, get current user, logout endpoints

request.description: Login as Admin user. Copy the access_token from response.

item.name: 2. Admin
item.description: Admin endpoints for managing schools and promotion criteria

request.description: Get details of a specific school
Create a new school with school head

item.name: 3. School Head
item.description: School Head endpoints for managing grades, classes, subjects, and teachers

request.description: Get all grades in the school
Get all classes in the school
Assign a class head using phone number
Get all subjects in the school
Create a new assessment type with default weight
Assign a teacher to a subject/class
Get all teachers in the school

item.name: 4. Teacher
item.description: Teacher endpoints for managing grades and assessments

request.description: Get classes assigned to this teacher
Get subjects assigned to this teacher
Get assessment weights for a class/subject
Get list of students in a class
Get grades for all students in a class/subject
Submit grades for class head approval
Get computed weighted averages for all students

item.name: 5. Class Head
item.description: Class Head endpoints for reviewing, compiling, and publishing grades

request.description: Get all students in the class head's class
Get list of all subjects and their submission status
View details of a grade submission
Reject a grade submission with reason
Get student rankings by average score
Compile all approved grades into final results
Publish results to students and parents
Send class roster to Store House for archiving

item.name: 6. Student
item.description: Student endpoints for viewing reports and grades

request.description: Get detailed grades for a specific subject
Get student's rank and average in class

item.name: 7. Parent
item.description: Parent endpoints for viewing children's grades

request.description: Get child's full year report card
Get child's detailed grades for a subject
Get child's rank and average in class

item.name: 8. Store House
item.description: Store House endpoints for managing rosters and transcripts

request.description: Get rosters filtered by grade and academic year
Get detailed roster with all student data
Search all students in the school
Generate official transcript for a student
